bio: Russ Fustino is Head of Developer Evangelism at ComponentOne. He is a highly experienced Windows Phone and Windows 8 software developer with a passion for conveying relevant, current, and future software development technologies and tools through live seminars, teaching, and internet video productions. Russ is a Microsoft Windows 8 Key Influencer and is a recipient of the INETA Lifetime Achievement award. Russ has a new innovative blog and interview video series with influentials, about current technology, ComponentOne products and developer community called 'Russ Cam'! Check it out at [http://www.componentone.com/russcam](http://www.componentone.com/russcam).
